last_episode_to_air.name: The John Keel Files Special
last_episode_to_air.overview: In the late 1960s the town of Point Pleasant, West Virginia is besieged by a series of monstrous creatures, blood-seeking UFOs, and mysterious men in black. Two reporters seek answers, culminating in one of the deadliest disasters in U.S. history.

name: Monsters and Mysteries in America
overview: Featuring first-person accounts with everyday people who believe they have come face to face with real-life folktale fiends, this series travels our country's untamed wilderness to tell of its storied past.

episodes.name: Appalachia
episodes.overview: Sheepsquatch (Breckenridge County, KY) - The border between southwest Virginia and West Virginia is an area shrouded in mystery and folklore, but few mysteries are more unusual and intriguing than that of the Appalachian white beast known to the locals as Sheepsquatch.

episodes.name: Pacific Northwest
episodes.overview: Sasquatch (Sierra Mountains, CA / Olympic Mountains, WA) - Within the region's dark, tightly packed interior, wildlife is so abundant that it's become the rumoured home of an elusive wild creature known as Sasquatch. Many adventurers are drawn to these mountains in hopes of encountering the famed hairy giant, but some confront the monster purely by chance, like Justin Smeja who encountered a family of Sasquatch during a routine hunting trip.

episodes.name: Ozarks
episodes.overview: Tales involving the Fouke Monster and the Pope Lick Monster are recounted by people from the Ozarks claiming to have encountered these mythical creatures. Also: The visual phenomenon known as the Spooklight is explored.

episodes.name: Badlands
episodes.overview: Myths and legends from the North Dakota Badlands. Included: the Devil's Highway; Black Eyed children; and the curse of Superstition Mountain.

episodes.name: The Swamp
episodes.overview: Stories of creatures that allegedly lurk around the swamps of Louisiana. Included: the mythical Honey Island Swamp monster; the shape-shifting Rougarou; and vampires.

episodes.name: Desert Wasteland
episodes.overview: When desert ranchers suffer unexplained terror, the suspects appear to be Thunderbirds & Skinwalkers. A family comes under attack by the Nightstalker, and a couple reveals their horrifying encounter with extraterrestrials-Alien Abductions.

episodes.name: Goat Man, Zombie Soldiers, Chupacabra
episodes.overview: Texas is a hotbed of monster activity. The Lake Worth community is being terrorized by a hybrid man-goat; in Cuero Phylis Canion has proof of a Chupacabra; and in Brownsville a young couple is attacked by an aggressive Zombie soldier.

episodes.name: Pukwudgie, Aliens, Dover Demon
episodes.overview: The Bridgewater Triangle is shrouded with inexplicable phenomena and UFO sightings. A deadly swamp Pukwudgie attacked Bill Russo; the Hewins sisters are used as a breeders for aliens; and the Dover Demon reigns over an entire town.

episodes.name: Momo, Shadow People, Van Meter Visitor
episodes.overview: A vicious hairy beast, a giant winged creature, and shadow monsters terrify their witnesses and plunge towns across America into panic and fear. Eyewitnesses go on record and recount stories of the Momo, Van Meter Visitor and the Shadow People.

episodes.name: Wolfman, Dogman, Wendigo
episodes.overview: Hybrid beasts are not legends in Michigan. They are real. Across the state a Wendigo transforms men into cannibals; in the countryside a man-wolf preys on one road; and in the city a bloodthirsty manimal confronts Jeff Cornelius.

episodes.name: Bigfoot Wars, Evil Gnome, Hell Hound
episodes.overview: An Evil Gnome stalks a family in Porterville, Researchers are scared off by a Bigfoot in the Sierra Mountains, and Hell Hounds rampage in Palm Springs.

episodes.name: Skunk Ape, Pascagoula Aliens, Lizard Man
episodes.overview: Florida’s Skunk Ape stalks and attacks a hunter in the swamp, evidence of the Lizard Man of Scape Ore Swamp is revealed, and a teenage boy in South Carolina survives an extraordinary alien abudction and lives to tell his story.

episodes.name: Green-Clawed Beast, Big Muddy Monster, Ohio Grassman
episodes.overview: A family’s day hike turns into nightmare when the children run off on their own and encounter the monstrous Grassman, a mother is viciously attacked in a river by the Green Clawed Beast and multiple Murphysboro residents meet the Big Muddy Monster.

episodes.name: Flying Humanoid, Jersey Devil, Batsquatch
episodes.overview: No longer the stuff of legend the Batsquatch reigns terror from the skies in the Rio Grande, the Jersey Devil attacks residents of the Pine Barrens and the Flying Humanoid stalks the Missouri Ozarks.

episodes.name: Abduction No. 1, Aliens Cloned My Husband, Alien Matrix
episodes.overview: The case of alien abduction that started it all: in the fall of 1961, one unique couple’s claim of a terrifying encounter. Since then, abductees have reported a range of shocking scenarios including invasive examinations, implants, and alien cloning.

episodes.name: The Rake, Sykesville Monster, Lechuza
episodes.overview: A towering nocturnal monster and an owl witch relentlessly stalk the young and innocent. Sightings of a wildman beast plunged a town into panic and may even have launched a secret government search. --- The Rake, Lechuza, and Sykesville Monster.

episodes.name: Melonheads, Devil Monkey, Blue Albino Woman
episodes.overview: Across America, grotesque, angry, vicious mutant monsters are out for revenge. Victims of unexplained terror at the hands of Melonheads, Devil Monkey, and the Blue Albino Woman come forward to share their horrifying stories.

episodes.name: UFO Bigfoot, Lake Pepin Monster, Cajun Werewolf
episodes.overview: Federal investigations involving a mysterious bigfoot from outer space; An aquatic mega monster viciously emerging from the depths; And a shape shifting werewolf summoned to protect the swamps. UFO Bigfoot, Lake Pepin Monster, Cajun Werewolf

episodes.name: Men in Black
episodes.overview: Ever since UFO sightings began, reports of mysterious dark suited men have followed. These Men-in-Black have been spotted around the world, threatening witnesses and destroying evidence. Are they government agents, extra-terrestrial or something demonic?

episodes.name: Tennessee Wildman, Subterranean Reptoids
episodes.overview: Hunters encounter the legendary Wildman in the forests of Tennessee.

episodes.name: Sabine Thing, Lightning Psychics
episodes.overview: A group is terrorized by fearsome creatures lurking along the Sabine River and two lightning strike survivors develop psychic powers.

episodes.name: Florida Zombies, Dybbuk Box, Shenango Dog Boy
episodes.overview: An unseen force turns normal men into zombies with a craving for human flesh; tragedy befalls anyone who encounters a cursed Dybbuk box; young girls are hunted by the Shenango Dog Boy.

episodes.name: Vermont Pigman, The Bridge Where I Died, Project Stargate
episodes.overview: The legendary Pigman unleashes a beastly wrath upon trespassing teenagers in a small Vermont town; an alluring hitchhiker has monstrous plans for anyone who gives her a ride; a secret government program uses psychic spies.

episodes.name: Mill Race Monster, Toxic Rain, Devil Dogs
episodes.overview: In Columbus, Indiana a swampy beast's terrifying attacks lead to the largest monster hunt in U.S. history. Bizarre gel-like rain sickens residents in Oakville, Washington; could the military be to blame? And hungry Devil Dogs guard a cursed Wisconsin island.

episodes.name: Carolina Reptile Man, Succubus, Napa Rebobs
episodes.overview: A cold-blooded reptilian beast preys upon unsuspecting campers along the South Carolina coast. A seductive succubus with a taste for terror targets a young rock musician. A mad scientist's monstrous flying monkeys unleash their wrath upon Napa Valley.

episodes.name: Spottsville Monster, Tornado Phantoms, Mantis Man
episodes.overview: An entire family takes up arms in a rooftop showdown with the Spottsville Monster, a vicious beast with a taste for flesh. Eerie Phantoms protect survivors of one of America's most deadly tornadoes and New Jersey fishermen face off with a gigantic bug.

episodes.name: Demon Panther, Doppelganger, Helicopter Crew Meets UFO
episodes.overview: The people of Southern Illinois arm themselves against a demonic feline predator; a doppelganger attempts to take the place of a teenage girl; a UFO tries to shoot down a police helicopter.

episodes.name: The John Keel Files Special
episodes.overview: In the late 1960s the town of Point Pleasant, West Virginia is besieged by a series of monstrous creatures, blood-seeking UFOs, and mysterious men in black. Two reporters seek answers, culminating in one of the deadliest disasters in U.S. history.
